author: Reuters Editorial
title: Iraqi air strike targets IS position used by commanders of the group in Syria - PM
text:
BAGHDAD, May 6 (Reuters) - The Iraqi air force carried out a new strike on an Islamic State position inside Syria, Prime Minister Haider al-Abadiâ€™s office said in a statement on Sunday.
The strike targeted a position used by the commanders of the group, south of the town of Deshaisha, the statement said. The Iraqi air force has already carried out several air strikes against the group in Syria since last year, with the approval of the Syrian government of President Bashar al-Assad and the U.S.-led coalition fighting Islamic State.
Reporting by Maher Chmaytelli; Editing by Adrian Croft
